The temperature outside is %1$d°\n\nDon’t let the agony, regret, or fog of yesterday blind you to the fact that each new day carries with it a plethora of opportunities to move your life into the right direction.

The temperature outside is %1$d°\n\nOur mind is like a cloudy sky: in essence clear and pure, but overcast by clouds of delusions. Just as the thickest clouds can disperse, so, too, even the heaviest delusions can be removed from our mind.
The temperature outside is %1$d°\n\nA cloudy day or a little sunshine have as great an influence on many constitutions as the most recent blessings or misfortunes.

The temperature outside is %1$d°\n\nAll shadows of clouds the sun cannot hide like the moon cannot stop oceanic tide but a hidden star can still be smiling at night\'s black spell on darkness, beguiling
